message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a price of $130 for the item.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. How about we settle on $142?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort. I would like to counter with a price of $135 for the product.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out. How about we meet at $144?
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counter with a price of $140 for the product.
I think we're really close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $141, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. What do you think?
